greenwald.name: Greenwald density limit
greenwald.notes: Canonical Greenwald limit definition widely used; see Greenwald et al. 1988.

troyon.name: Troyon beta limit scaling
troyon.equation: beta_N = beta[%] * a[m] * B[T] / I_p[MA]; beta_N,max ≈ g (order 2-4) depending on shaping
troyon.notes: Semi-empirical scaling; coefficient g to be confirmed from paper formatting.

eich.name: Eich 2013 H-mode lambda_q scaling (proportionality)
eich.notes: Extracted from abstract/regression statement; coefficient not included in this pass.
